definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: The most common torque need for the upper incisors during orthodontic treatment is increased palatal root torque.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的扭矩需要切牙正畸治疗中增加腭根扭矩。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the orthodontic therapy and the associated problems of the patients with maxillary impacted canine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨上颌尖牙阻生的正畸治疗及相关问题。

sentences.english: In this article, the application of distraction osteogenesis in orthodontic area was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文就牵张成骨术在正畸领域的具体应用进行综述。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the changes of gingivitis index and bacteria in crevicular fluid during orthodontic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨正畸治疗中牙龈指数及龈沟液细菌的变化。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relation between the skeletal age and the rate of tooth movement.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨正畸治疗中骨龄与牙移动速率的关系。

sentences.english: Objective We provided the reference for diagnoses in Othodontics of total dental space analysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的为口腔正畸诊断中全牙列间隙分析提供理论依据。

sentences.english: Flared incisors and deep overbite are challenging to treat orthodontically.
sentences.chinese: 爆发门齿和深覆具有挑战性治疗正畸。

sentences.english: Drawing of the oral cavity teeth provides base for computer aided orthodontia.
sentences.chinese: 口腔牙齿的描绘为口腔辅助正畸系统建立提供基础。

sentences.english: Objective To establish an animal model for research of orthodontic tooth movement.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立正畸牙移动的实验动物模型。

sentences.english: I work for an Orthodontics office and we want to make Tshirts to give out to patients.
sentences.chinese: 我为正畸办公室工作，我们想使T恤给了病人。

sentences.english: The researcher simulated the anchorage tooth movement in the orthodontic therapy and established the zoic trial model.
sentences.chinese: 建立动物实验模型模拟正畸矫治中支抗牙移动。

sentences.english: Conclusion Stomatological aesthetic education should be strengthened in orthodontic postgraduates.
sentences.chinese: 结论口腔正畸学研究生应加强口腔医学美学教育。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of local appliance to prosthodontic patients with local malocclusion which impaired prosthodontic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨影响义齿修复的局部错的正畸治疗。

sentences.english: An orthodontist took a cast of the inside of Billy's mouth.
sentences.chinese: 正畸医生从比利的口腔内部取了模型。

sentences.english: The study and the application of anchorage implants had attracted more and more attention from the orthodontists .
sentences.chinese: 支抗种植体是近年来国内外正畸学研究的热点之一。

sentences.english: The shape of dental arch for orthodontic diagnosis and treatment is of great significance.
sentences.chinese: 牙弓形状的检测对正畸诊断和治疗具有重要的意义。

definition: to fill a tooth (cavity)/to have a tooth filled/a dental filling
to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
to have a false tooth set in/denture
to correct (e.g. sight or hearing)/to rectify/to cure
